This is a horrible movie!  The video quality and audio is, as usual, superb, but the plot STINKS!  It is more depressing than Sheri S. Tepper's novel The Gate To Women's Countryl--and that is saying something.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Gate_to_Women's_Country#Plot

I mean thank you for the up load . I am truly sorry for others whom don't yet understand how you work'

I mean thank you for the up load . Also I am sorry for the ones that don't understand how you work. They complain too much without understanding what you go through.I also don't understand 100%.But I do appreciate . I Would not want to do what you do. I imagine it's very time consuming .
Big Thanks to all of you.

To be fair, though, I downloaded it and watched it because of Keira Knightley alone, and didn't read the "Sci-Fi/Thriller" part until later.  I will try not to make the same mistake in future, twentyforty.  I seeded it for about 20 hours, then deleted it--too depressing for the limited space on my hard drives.
